Inscription d'un nouvel utilisateur

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"email":{"type":"string","example":"user@example.com","description":"Adresse email"},"password":{"type":"string","example":"motdepasse123","minLength":8,"description":"Mot de passe (min 8 caractères)"},"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"Jane","description":"Prénom"},"profileType":{"type":"string","example":"FEMALE","description":"Type de profil"},"contextType":{"type":"string","example":"CYCLE","description":"Type de contexte"}},"required":["email","password"],"title":"RegisterDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Utilisateur inscrit","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tokens":{"type":"object","properties":{"accessToken":{"type":"string","example":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs..."},"refreshToken":{"type":"string","example":"eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIs..."},"expiresIn":{"type":"number","example":900}}},"user":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"cuid_example"},"email":{"type":"string","example":"user@example.com"},"firstName":{"type":"string","example":"Jane"},"profileType":{"type":"string","example":"FEMALE"},"contextType":{"type":"string","example":"CYCLE"}}}},"required":["tokens","user"],"title":"AuthResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Erreur de validation ou utilisateur existant"}}}
 id="auth-controller-register-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
